overview_of_class: An investigation of the cognitive, cultural, and learning mechanisms that underlie or enable musical creativity. Readings are drawn from recent and historical music theory, (creative) cognition, and the history of creativity, among other areas.
name: Seminar in Music Theory & Cognition
title: MUSIC MUS_THRY 450-0-20 Seminar in Music Theory & Cognition

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An investigation of the cognitive, cultural, and learning mechanisms that underlie or enable musical creativity. Readings are drawn from recent and historical music theory, (creative) cognition, and the history of creativity, among other areas.

subject: MUS_THRY
